input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item title:
GiftBay Wedding Metal Charger Plates 13" Round with Beautiful Fleur-de-lis Embossed on Border, Burgundy Finish, Set of 4 Plates, Made of Heavy Metal Sheet and Powder Coated

Item specifications:
Awesome metal charger plates with embossed Fleur-de-lis design, comes in a set of 4, burgundy finish
Excellent value, why buy cheap plastic made, when available direct from factory at an excellent price
Measures 13" diameter and fits in regular dinner plates
Cannot be used as dinner plates themselves
Additional quantity is available if needed for immediate shipment until is sold out
Powder Coated finish to last for long time for professional wedding and special events planners
Charger Plates also available in different designs and colors

Product description:
input_text.Response A: These are heavy metal charger plates and not for use as dinner plates themselves.  They come in a set of 4 with an embossed Fleur-de-lis design on the border and a burgundy finish.  They measure 13" in diameter and fit in regular dinner plates.  The powder coating is applied to heavy metal sheet and will last for a long time.  These are also available in other colors and designs.  Additional quantity is available if needed for immediate shipment until is sold out.
input_text.Response B: GiftBay Wedding Charger Plates 13" Round with Beautiful Fleur-de-lis Embossed on Border, Burgundy Finish, Set of 4 Plates, Made of Heavy Metal Sheet and Powder Coated. This is a set of 4 metal charger plates with embossed Fleur-de-lis design. They come in burgundy finish. These cannot be used as dinner plates themselves. They are made of heavy metal sheet and powder coated to last for a long time. They measure 13" in diameter and fits in regular dinner plates. Additional quantity is available if needed for immediate shipment until is sold out. Excellent value, why buy cheap plastic made, when available direct from factory at an excellent price. Charger Plates also available in different designs and colors.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
